cms_block.title: Kalolia - Responsive Magento Theme
cms_block.layout_update_xml:
<reference name="header"> <block type="slideshow/slideshow" name="sns.slideshow" as="slideshow"/> </reference> <reference name="content"> <block type="kalolia/usecache" name="cache.content"> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="section.no1"> <action method="setParams"><params>class="mrb30"</params></action> <action method="setRow"><row>1</row></action> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="section.no1.no1"> <action method="setParams"><params>class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-12 col-xs-12"</params></action> <block type="products/deals" name="section.no1.no1.1" /> </block> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="section.no1.no2"> <action method="setParams"><params>class="col-lg-8 col-md-8 col-sm-12 col-xs-12"</params></action> <block type="cms/block" name="kalolia_banner1"> <action method="setBlockId"><block_id>kalolia_banner1</block_id></action> </block> </block> </block> <block type="producttabs/grid" name="producttabs.grid"> <action method="setConfig"> <name> <title>Feature Products</title> <order_type>is_featured</order_type> </name> </action> </block> </block> </reference> <reference name="after_content"> <block type="kalolia/usecache" name="cache.after_content"> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="section.slidercategory"> <action method="setId"><id>sns_category</id></action> <action method="setParams"><params>class="wrap"</params></action> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="wrap.slidercategory"> <block type="core/template" template="sns/blocks/category.phtml" /> </block> </block> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="section.bots"> <action method="setId"><id>sns_bots</id></action> <action method="setParams"><params>class="wrap"</params></action> <action method="setContainer"><container>1</container></action> <block type="producttabs/slider" name="producttabs.slider"> <action method="setConfig"> <name> <number_per_display>16</number_per_display> </name> </action> </block> </block> <block type="cms/block" name="kalolia_banner2"> <action method="setBlockId"><block_id>kalolia_banner2</block_id></action> </block> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="section.botsl2"> <action method="setId"><id>sns_botsl2</id></action> <action method="setParams"><params>class="wrap"</params></action> <action method="setContainer"><container>1</container></action> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="section.botsl2.no1"> <action method="setParams"><params>class="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12"</params></action> <block type="blog/blog" template="aw_blog/custom-bloglatest.phtml" /> </block> <block type="kalolia/wrapper" name="section.botsl2.no2"> <action method="setParams"><params>class="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12"</params></action> <block type="core/template" template="sns/blocks/partners.phtml" /> </block> </block>
</block> </reference>
